actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 93-871.

official_title: Resolution to increase the sums allotted to the Select Committee on Presidential Campaign Activities.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Increases the expenses of the Senate Select Committee on Presidential Campaign Activities during the full period of its existence to not in excess of $2,000,000, of which not in excess of $70,000 shall be available for the procurement of the services of individual consultants or organizations thereof.

titles.title: Resolution to increase the sums allotted to the Select Committee on Presidential Campaign Activities.
